title: Fans of NHL hockey in Canada 2014 , by age group
summary: The given chart is of multi-line type with 2 lines namely Yes, and No. The y axis represents SOME LABEL and the x axis represents Year.
Overall No is gradually increasing, Yes is gradually decreasing,  throughout the Year
The lines ordered according to average values of SOME LABEL in descending order is: 1. Yes, and lastly, 2. No.
Throughout the period, Yes generally had the highest SOME LABEL relative to others with an average of 52.33, and it reached its maximum at 18-34_years with a value of 60.0.
No mostly had the least SOME LABEL with a mean value of 47.67, which peaked at 65+_years with a value of 53.0.
The greatest difference of SOME LABEL between Yes and No occurs at Year 18-34_years and the smallest difference occurs at 35-44_years.
